content: crochet something beautiful understated and functional for your kitchen introducing the serendipity potholder this potholder is crocheted in 1 piece and is worked in the round to create a double thick potholder it uses the single_crochet and spike stitch to create a beautiful diagonal striped pattern it s easier than it looks i hope you have fun making and using your potholder s > this potholder pattern is the 10th pattern in the ** 2023 pot holders galore crochet-along 1 ** with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 12 +1 bonus potholder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final potholder along with the bonus pattern > the free pattern for the serendipity potholder can be found **here ** 2 > the complete video tutorial can be found **here ** 3 > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms size this potholder measures 8 5 wide x 8 25 long but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 5 0mm crochet hook needed * 143 yds / 131 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin for more information see https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-zig- 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-serendipity-potholder-pgcal2023/ 3 https //youtu be/um4ehxqkqpe 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/
